text: The 2017 ITTF Challenge Series was the inaugural season of the International Table Tennis Federation's secondary professional table tennis tour, a level below the ITTF World Tour. ==Schedule== Below is the schedule released by the ITTF: {| class=wikitable style="font-size:100%" !rowspan=2|Tour !rowspan=2|Event !rowspan=2|Location !rowspan=2|Venue !colspan=2|Date !rowspan=2|Prize money (USD) |April 30 |align=center|35,000 | |- |5 | Zagreb Open |Zagreb |Zagreb Hall of Sports |May 2 |May 6 |align=center|35,000 | |- |6 | Brazil Open |São Paulo |Brazilian Paralympic Center |May 3 |May 7
